Control Name: 4.6.9 Load balancer health probes assess data platform components.
Control Statement: Do health probes asses critical internal data dependencies? e.g. do health probes perform a mutable database operation.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.6 What decisions have been taken to ensure the data platform meets your reliability requirements?
